40_Situation/What led to archaeologists to believe there as an ancient village on this site? The lucky discovery of old records, bases of several structures visible in the grass or unusual stones found near the castle.md
40_Situation/Who was responsible for starting the community project? the castle owners, a national charity or the local council.md
40_Situation/Which event requires the largest number of volunteers? The music festival, the science festival, the book festival.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_5f5033_Who was responsible for starting the community project? the castle owners, a national charity or the local council.md
99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_95c9e9_What was found on the other side of the river to the castle? The remains of a large palace, the outline of fields or a number of small huts.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_5962ff_What led to archaeologists to believe there as an ancient village on this site? The lucky discovery of old records, bases of several structures visible in the grass or unusual stones found near the castle.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_9dd0d7_What led the archaeologists to believe there as an ancient village on this site? The lucky discovery of old records, the bases of several structures visible in the grass or the unusual stones found near the castle.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_43f630_What do the team plan to do after work ends this summer? prepare a display for a museum, take part in a television programme or start to organise school visits.md
99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_01c1e1_What are the team still hoping to find? everyday pottery, animal bones or pieces of jewellery.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_0ed9b5_Maya says a mistaken belief about theatre programmes is that? theatres pay companies to produce them, few theatre-goers buy them nowadays or they contain far more adverts than previously.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_875ed0_Maya feels their project should include an explanation of why companies of actors? promoted their own plays, performed plays outdoors or had to tour with their plays.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_183ff6_Maya doesn't fully understand why, in the 20th century, very few theatre programmes were printed in the USA; British theatre programmes failed to develop for so long or theatre programmes in Britain copied fashions from the USA.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_6c1edb_How was the gold coin found? Heavy rain had removed some of the soil, the ground was dug up by wild rabbits or a person with a metal detector searched the area.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_d04d8a_Finn was surprised that, in early British theatre, programmes? were difficult for audiences to obtain, were given out free of charge or were seen as a kind of contract.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_5ba51c_Finn was pleased to discover that their topic? was not familiar to their module leader, had not been chosen by other students or did not prove to be difficult to research.md

99_Tools/backups/20251225_151414_236628_Finn and Maya both think that, compared to 19nd-century programmes, those from the 18nd century? were more original, were more colourful or were more informative.md
